title: Siuuu Later Ronaldo
description:
The FC crew break down Erik ten Hag's strong comments condemning the players including Cristiano Ronaldo who left Manchester United's friendly against Rayo Vallecano early. Plus, Frank Leboeuf and Julien Laurens join the show to react Marc Cucurella's impending move to Chelsea and preview PSG's season under Christophe Galtier.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Chelsea close in on Cucurella deal; Ten Hag hits back at Ronaldo early exit; Do PSG need to win the Champions league to have a successful season?
